* **Call to action:** I'm asking Bob to "meet in the middle" to encourage him to consider my offer.

**Next steps:**

I'll be prepared to negotiate further if necessary, but I'm hoping this counteroffer will be more appealing to Bob. I'm also keeping in mind that I can always sell to John for $10,000 if negotiations fail.
